parameters.description: One or more involved parties (by `slug`) to filter on.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Date from which to filter adverts on, inclusive, takes into account `createdDate`, `updatedDate` and `signatureDate`.

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: Date to which to filter adverts on, inclusive, takes into account `createdDate`, `updatedDate` and `signatureDate`.

created.description: ISO representation of the date the case was created.

advertId.description: Id of the advert the case is related to.

applicationId.description: Id of the submitted application, default to null on older cases.

caseNumber.description: Case number (numeric string) gets generated automatically when a case is created.

status.description: Status of the case, default to "Innsent"

tag.description: Internal tag for the case, default to null

createdAt.description: Date the case was created. ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.

modifiedAt.description: Date when the case was last updated. ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.

assignedTo.description: User the case is assigned to.

communicationStatus.description: Status of communication with the applicant, default to `CaseCommunicationStatus.NotStarted`

publishedAt.description: Date the case was published. ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.

requestedPublicationDate.description: Requested advert publication date. ISO 8601 date and time format in UTC.
